level.heading: Resident records.
level.text: A record shall be maintained for every resident and include the following:
The resident agreement required by this subchapter, including the "Resident's Rights" statement and any additional agreements;
A physician's statement, including medical orders and rehabilitation plans;
The ISP and any revisions thereto;
Any note and comments added to the record by the ALR.
